attributes.action: commend the various representatives and services (Ambassadorial, Consular, Home and Foreign Office, Police and others) who have assisted the Portuguese Police in the investigation of the disappearance of Madeleine McCann.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many Government departments have worked hard to assist their Portuguese counterparts in this matter. In return they have been exposed to unremitting criticism from small groups of people who suspect some over-whelming conspiracy going right to the centre of the body politic to protect Madeleine's parents or others.

We wish to show our solidarity with those government offices that have laboured to assist with the investigation and have been pilloried on unrepresentative websites for their efforts.

We feel that the Prime Minister should publicly commend the actions of these people and services in order to express support and gratitude for their efforts.
